CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
BLS          	BLOWING SNOW                     	BLS                       
DRZ          	DRIZZLE                          	DRZ                        
DST          	DUST                             	DST                       
FOG          	FOG                              	FOG                       
HAZ          	HAZE/SMOKE                       	HAZ                        
RAI          	RAIN                             	RAI                       
SMK          	SMOKE                            	SMK                        
SNO          	SNOW                             	SNO                        
99999        	VISIBILITY REST INVALID          	ERROR MESSAGE
